department.dept_long_name: Department of Earth and Planetary Sciences

course.title: Tutorial - Senior Year
course.faculty_text: Zhiming Kuang and members of the Department
course.description: Research and writing of the senior thesis under faculty direction.
course.notes: Senior honors candidates must take at least one term of this course (fall or spring) if writing a thesis; an oral presentation is required. Enrollment includes an informal tutorial series on how to get the most from your thesis experience.
